definition[0]: a situation that is unusual or amusing because something strange happens, or the opposite of what is expected happens or is true
example[0]: Life is full of little ironies.
example[1]: The tragic irony is that the drug was supposed to save lives.
definition[1]: when you use words that are the opposite of what you really mean, often in order to be amusing
example[2]: Wagner calls his program ‘the worst talk show in America, ’ without a hint of irony.
example[3]: ‘Of course Michael won’t be late; you know how punctual he always is, ’ she said with heavy irony.
